Malice:
Malice dropped down to one knee to avoid the armor piercing rounds =
and roll past Myrmidon.=A0 He drew his chainsword and launched the tip at a=
 control panel to drop a blast partition between them.=A0 After he got to h=
is feet he locked the partition in place and ran down the corridor to drop =
more partitions from a terminal.=A0 He then overloaded the terminal's buffe=
r with jibberish and then moved deeper into the base to continue backing up=
 the computer systems.=A0 He finally hacked the security system and shut do=
wn the autoguns and began looking for the captive Maximals.

Myrmidon grunted as his arm was bent at an unaccustomed degree, a=
s his
servos protested. Slight sparks flew as his arm bent and fles and the=
n
resisted! It locked into place as he spun in place. 

A slow smile appear=
ed on Myrmidon's face as Malice attempted to drive
home the katana. At firs=
t it seemed as if it would be a death-lock
shot, but at the last nano Myrmi=
don caught the blade on his forearm,
the blade skitting and flashing on his=
 armor as it cuts deep . . . and
is deflected. 

But at the same time Myrmi=
don's shoulder mounted cannons reoriented
themselves on Malice as the recon=
figured thier ordinance. They click as
they slide into place and blast with=
 twin armor piercing rounds!

Myrmidon's smile broadens!

<html><head><style type="text/css"><!-- DIV {margin:0px;} --></style></head><body><div style="font-family:times new roman, new york, times, serif;font-size:12pt"><DIV style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, new york, times, serif">Malice:</DIV>
<DIV style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, new york, times, serif"> </DIV>
<DIV style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, new york, times, serif">Malice dropped down to one knee to avoid the armor piercing rounds and roll past Myrmidon.  He drew his chainsword and launched the tip at a control panel to drop a blast partition between them.  After he got to his feet he locked the partition in place and ran down the corridor to drop more partitions from a terminal.  He then overloaded the terminal's buffer with jibberish and then moved deeper into the base to continue backing up the computer systems.  He finally hacked the security system and shut down the autoguns and began looking for the captive Maximals.<BR><BR></DIV>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; MARGIN: 5px 0px 5px 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, new york, times, serif">----- Original Message ----<BR>From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...><BR>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com<BR>Sent: Saturday, May 3, 2008 6:36:23 PM<BR>Subject: Re: Black Fortress<BR><BR>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>

Slight sparks flew as his arm bent and fles and then<BR>resisted! It locked into place as he spun in place. <BR><BR>A slow smile appeared on Myrmidon's
 face as Malice attempted to drive<BR>home the katana. At first it seemed as if it would be a death-lock<BR>shot, but at the last nano Myrmidon caught the blade on his forearm,<BR>the blade skitting and flashing on his armor as it cuts deep . . . and<BR>is deflected. <BR><BR>But at the same time Myrmidon's shoulder mounted cannons reoriented<BR>themselves on Malice as the reconfigured thier ordinance.
